1.0.0x40FDD0:
function CVector_ctor<thiscall, 0x406D20>(self: int {CVector}, x: float, y: float, z: float)

int pVector1 = get_label_pointer @cvector1
int pVector2 = get_label_pointer @cvector2
int pVector3 = get_label_pointer @cvector3

CVector_ctor(pVector1, 10.0, 20.0, 30.0)
CVector_ctor(pVector2, 15.0, 25.0, 35.0)
CVector_Add(pVector3, pVector1, pVector2)

float x = read_memory_with_offset pVector3 0 4
float y = read_memory_with_offset pVector3 4 4
float z = read_memory_with_offset pVector3 8 4

print_help_formatted "vec (%.2f, %.2f, %.2f)" x y z

jump @skip

const sizeOf_CVector = 12
:cvector1
hex
00(sizeOf_CVector)
end
:cvector2
hex
00(sizeOf_CVector)
end
:cvector3
hex
00(sizeOf_CVector)
end

:skip

1.0.0x444300:
function CGangWars_EndGangWar<cdecl, 0x4464C0>(bool: int)

while true
    wait 0
    if test_cheat "i"
    then
        wait 0
        if or
            is_gang_war_going_on
            is_gang_war_fighting_going_on
        then
            CGangWars_EndGangWar(true)
            Blip hDefenseBlip = read_memory 0x96AB98 size 4 virtual_protect 0  // CGangWars__RadarBlip
            if does_blip_exist hDefenseBlip
            then remove_blip hDefenseBlip
            end    
        else
            CGangWars_StartDefensiveGangWar()    
        end
    end
end
1.0.0x446050:
function CGangWars_EndGangWar<cdecl, 0x4464C0>(bool: int)

while true
    wait 0
    if test_cheat "o"
    then
        wait 0
        if or
            is_gang_war_going_on
            is_gang_war_fighting_going_on
        then
            CGangWars_EndGangWar(true)
            Blip hDefenseBlip = read_memory 0x96AB98 size 4 virtual_protect 0  // CGangWars__RadarBlip
            if does_blip_exist hDefenseBlip
            then remove_blip hDefenseBlip
            end    
        else
            CGangWars_StartOffensiveGangWar()    
        end
    end
end

end

1.0.0x6D2370:
const modelId = #COPCARLA

spawn_vehicle_by_cheating modelId

if int v = FindVehicleNearby(modelId, 50.0)
then
    int res = CVehicle_IsLawEnforcementVehicle(v)
    if is_bit_set res 0
    then
        print_formatted "Car %d is law enforcement" 5000 modelId
    else
        print_formatted "Car %d is not law enforcement" 5000 modelId
    end
else
    print_formatted "Vehicle not found"   
end

terminate_this_script


function FindVehicleNearby(model: int, radius: float): optional int {CVehicle*}
    function CWorld_FindNearestObjectOfType<cdecl, 0x5693F0>(modelId: int, point: int {CVector const&}, radius: float, b2D: int {bool}, buildings: int {bool}, vehicles: int {bool}, peds: int {bool}, objects: int {bool}, dummies: int {bool}): int {CEntity}

    Char playerChar = get_player_char 0
    float pos[3]
    pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] = get_char_coordinates playerChar
    
    int pPos = get_var_pointer pos
    int addr = CWorld_FindNearestObjectOfType(modelId, pPos, 50.0, false, false, {vehicles} true, false, false, false)
    
    if addr > 0
    then
        return addr
    end
    cleo_return_fail
end
1.0.0x6F3240:
function CCarGenerator_Get<cdecl, 0x479D60>(index: int): int

CarGenerator hJeffersonNRG = create_car_generator 2243.75 -1258.5 24.0 {heading} 90.0 {modelId} #NRG500 {Colors} 86 86 {forceSpawn} True {alarm} 0 {doorLock} 0 {minDelay} 0 {maxDelay} 10000 // Jefferson Alley
switch_car_generator hJeffersonNRG {amount} 101
int pCargen = CCarGenerator_Get(hJeffersonNRG)
write_memory_with_offset {address} pCargen {offset} 0x1C {size} 1 {value} 0xFE // won't save
wait 1000
CTheCarGenerators_RemoveCarGenerators(0xFE)
1.0.0x73A3E0:
int modelIdx = get_weapontype_model {weapon_type} WeaponType.Ak47
request_model {modelId} modelIdx
load_all_models_now
give_weapon_to_char $scplayer {weaponType} WeaponType.Ak47 {ammo} 999999
mark_model_as_no_longer_needed {modelId} modelIdx

while true
    wait 50
    
    WEAPON_ADD_SHELL($scplayer, 7) 
end

function WEAPON_ADD_SHELL(charHandle :int, weaponSlot :int)
    float pos[3]
    pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] = get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords charHandle {offset} 0.0 1.0 1.0

    float dir[2]
    dir[0] = 1.0
    dir[1] = 0.0
    
    int posPtr = get_var_pointer pos
    int dirPtr = get_var_pointer dir
    
    int pedPtr = get_ped_pointer {char} charHandle

    int weaponPtr = pedPtr + 0x5A0 // CPed.m_aWeapons[]
    weaponSlot *= 0x1C // size of CWeapon
    weaponPtr += weaponSlot
        
    CWeapon_AddGunshell(weaponPtr, pedPtr, posPtr, dirPtr, 5.0)
end

while true
    wait 0

    if
        is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
    then
        print_help_formatted {text} "~r~Key pressed!"

        
        // wait for key release
        while is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
            wait 0
        end
        
        print_help_formatted {text} "~g~Key released!"
    end
end
CLEO.0AB1:
while true
    wait 250
    
    if and
        is_player_playing $player1
        test_cheat "gun"
    then
        int ammo = GIVE_PLAYER_WEAPON(38) // this is actually CLEO_CALL command
        print_help_formatted {text} "%d bullets!" {args} ammo
    end
end

function GIVE_PLAYER_WEAPON(weaponType :int) : int
    int modelIdx = get_weapontype_model {weapon_type} weaponType
    request_model {modelId} modelIdx
    load_all_models_now
    
    give_weapon_to_char $scplayer {weaponType} weaponType {ammo} 100
    
    mark_model_as_no_longer_needed {modelId} modelIdx
    
    // check and return ammo count
    int ammo = get_ammo_in_char_weapon $scplayer {weaponType} weaponType
    cleo_return 1 ammo
end

float x,y,z
Char ped

while true
    wait 0
    
    if
        test_cheat "1"
    then
        get_active_camera_coordinates {store_to} x y z
        
        if
            get_random_char_in_sphere_no_save_recursive {pos} x y z {radius} 30.0 {find_next} false {skip_dead} true {store_to} ped
        then
            explode_char_head ped // the first one
            
            while get_random_char_in_sphere_no_save_recursive {pos} x y z {radius} 30.0 {find_next} true {skip_dead} true {store_to} ped
                explode_char_head ped
            end
        else
            print_formatted_now "First not found" {time} 4000
        end
    end
end

int Car
while true
    wait 100
    get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z

    then lock_car_doors Car lockStatus LockoutPlayerOnly
    end
end

CLEO+.0E4E:
{$USE CLEO+}

int screenTimer
display_onscreen_timer_local {var_timer} screenTimer {direction} TimerDirection.Down
screenTimer = 10000 // 10 seconds
set_timer_beep_countdown_time_local {var_timer} screenTimer {timeInSec} 6 // start beeping when less than 6 seconds left

while true
    wait 0
    
    print_formatted_now {text} "Peek time left: %d" {time} 3000 {args} screenTimer
    
    if
        screenTimer == 0
    then
        print_string_now {text} "Time is up!" {time} 3000
        break // exit the loop
    end    
end

clear_onscreen_timer_local {var_timer} screenTimer
CLEO+.0E4F:
{$USE CLEO+}

add_text_label {dynamicKey} 'TMR_TXT' {text} "~r~Explosion"

int screenTimer
display_onscreen_timer_with_string_local {var_timer} screenTimer {direction} TimerDirection.Down {text} 'TMR_TXT'
screenTimer = 10000 // 10 seconds
set_timer_beep_countdown_time_local {var_timer} screenTimer {timeInSec} 6 // start beeping when less than 6 seconds left

while true
    wait 0

    print_formatted_now {text} "Peek time left: %d" {time} 100 {args} screenTimer

    if
        screenTimer == 0
    then
        print_string_now {text} "~r~BOOM!" {time} 3000
        break // exit the loop
    end
end

clear_onscreen_timer_local {var_timer} screenTimer

bitwise.0B1E:
debug_on
int 0@, 1@, 2@, 3@
0@ = -42
1@ = allocate_memory size 4

// byte
write_memory address 1@ size 1 value 0@ vp false
2@ = read_memory address 1@ size 1 vp false
3@ = 2@
sign_extend 3@ from_size 1
trace "1 BYTE: original value: %d, read value: %d, extended sign: %d" 0@ 2@ 3@

// 2 bytes
write_memory address 1@ size 2 value 0@ vp false
2@ = read_memory address 1@ size 2 vp false
3@ = 2@
sign_extend 3@ from_size 2
trace "2 BYTES: original value: %d, read value: %d, extended sign: %d" 0@ 2@ 3@

// 3 bytes
write_memory address 1@ size 3 value 0@ vp false
2@ = read_memory address 1@ size 3 vp false
3@ = 2@
sign_extend 3@ from_size 3
trace "3 BYTES: original value: %d, read value: %d, extended sign: %d" 0@ 2@ 3@

// 4 bytes
write_memory address 1@ size 4 value 0@ vp false
2@ = read_memory address 1@ size 4 vp false
3@ = 2@
sign_extend 3@ from_size 4
trace "4 BYTES: original value: %d, read value: %d, extended sign: %d" 0@ 2@ 3@

default.00A5:
while true
    wait 0
    get_area_visible store_to interiorId
    if and
        is_key_pressed Key_F10
        interiorId == Outside
    then
        while is_key_pressed Key_F10
            wait 0
        end
        request_model #HUSTLER
        load_all_models_now
        repeat 
            wait 0
        until has_model_loaded #HUSTLER
        get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z
        get_closest_car_node_with_heading x y z store_to nodeX nodeY nodeZ heading
        clear_area nodeX nodeY nodeZ 3.0 False
        create_car #HUSTLER nodeX nodeY nodeZ store_to Car
        set_car_heading Car heading
        mark_car_as_no_longer_needed Car
        mark_model_as_no_longer_needed #HUSTLER
    end
end

        end
        request_model #HUSTLER
        load_all_models_now
        repeat 
            wait 0
        until has_model_loaded #HUSTLER
        get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z
        get_closest_car_node_with_heading x y z store_to nodeX nodeY nodeZ heading
        clear_area nodeX nodeY nodeZ 3.0 False
        create_car #HUSTLER nodeX nodeY nodeZ store_to Car
        set_car_heading Car heading
        mark_car_as_no_longer_needed Car
        mark_model_as_no_longer_needed #HUSTLER
    end
end
default.018C:
add_one_off_sound {pos} 0.0 0.0 0.0 {sound_id} ScriptSound.SoundRaceGo



// sound browser
int soundId = 1000
int keyWasDown = false
while true
    wait 0
    
    print_formatted_now "Sound id: %d~n~Press ~y~<~s~ and ~y~>~s~ to browse,~n~hold ~y~SHIFT~s~ to browse faster.~n~Press ~y~?~s~ to play again." {time} 0xFFFFFF {args} soundId
    
    // handle browse keys
    if or
        is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.OemComma // <
        is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.OemPeriod // >
    then
        keyWasDown = true
        
        int step
        if
            is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.OemPeriod
        then
            step = 1
        else
            step = -1
        end
        if
            is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.Shift
        then
            step *= 10
        end
        soundId += step
        
        // warp around if out of bounds
        if
            soundId < 1000
        then
            soundId = 1190
        end
        if
            soundId > 1190
        then
            soundId = 1000
        end
        
        // wait for key release or timeout
        while true
            if and
                not is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.OemComma // <
                not is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.OemPeriod // >
            then
                break // keys released
            end
            
            if
                TimerA > 30 // auto repeat time in miliseconds
            then
                TimerA = 0
                break
            end
            
            wait 0
        end
        
        continue
    end
    
    // handle play key
    if 
        is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.Oem2 // ? key
    then
        keyWasDown = true
        
        wait 50
        continue
    end
    
    if
        keyWasDown == true
    then
        float x, y, z
        x, y, z = get_char_coordinates $scplayer
        
        add_one_off_sound {pos} x y z {soundId} soundId
        
        keyWasDown = false
    end
    
    // keys are up
    TimerA = -200 // extra delay before auto repeat activates
end

default.03D3:
while true
    wait 0

    int interiorId = get_area_visible 
    if and
        is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
        interiorId == 0 // outside
    then
        // wait for key release
        while is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
            wait 0
        end
        
        float pos[3]
        pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] = get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords $scplayer {offset} 0.0 5.0 0.0

        
        float dir
        pos[0], pos[1], pos[2], dir = get_closest_car_node_with_heading {pos} pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] // find road
        
        clear_area {pos} pos[0] pos[1] pos[2] {radius} 3.0 {clearParticles} false
        
        request_model #HUSTLER
        load_all_models_now
        int carHandle = create_car {modelId} #HUSTLER {pos} pos[0] pos[1] pos[2]
        set_car_heading carHandle {heading} dir
        mark_car_as_no_longer_needed carHandle // will despawn on its own
    end
end

default.09C0:
const player=0, posOffset=120.0, negOffset=-120.0, NumLock = 144
int Char, Car, Blip
float x,y,z,x2,y2,z2

get_player_char Player store_to Char   
while true
    wait 0
    if 
        is_key_just_pressed NumLock
    then  
        get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords Char posOffset posOffset posOffset store_to x y z
        get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords Char negOffset negOffset negOffset store_to x2 y2 z2    
        get_random_car_of_type_in_angled_area_no_save x2 y2 x y 20.0 #TAXI store_to Car
        if Car <> -1           
        then add_blip_for_car Car store_to Blip
        end
    end
end

file.2302:
00C3: debug_on // enable trace command
0AC8: allocate_memory size 260 store_to address 0@

2000: resolve_filepath "root:" store_to 0@ // game root directory
2101: trace "Game installed in %s" 0@

2000: resolve_filepath "root:\data\ped.dat" store_to 0@ // get path to ped.dat
2101: trace 0@

2000: resolve_filepath "userfiles:" store_to 0@ // game saves location
2101: trace "User data location:~w~ %s" 0@

2000: resolve_filepath "." store_to 0@ // this script's source file directory (not affected by 0A99)
2101: trace "This script dir:~w~ %s" 0@

2000: resolve_filepath "cleo:" store_to 0@ // virtual path: CLEO directory
2101: trace "CLEO dir:~w~ %s" 0@

2000: resolve_filepath "modules:" store_to 0@ // virtual path: CLEO modules directory
2101: trace "CLEO modules dir:~w~ %s" 0@

2000: resolve_filepath "" store_to 0@ // relative path
2101: trace "Script's working directory is:~w~ %s" 0@

2000: resolve_filepath "file.txt" store_to 0@ // relative path
2101: trace 0@

0A99: set_current_directory 1 // user data

2000: resolve_filepath "" store_to 0@ // relative path
2101: trace "Script's changed working directory is:~w~ %s" 0@

2000: resolve_filepath "file.txt" store_to 0@ // path relative to location set with 0A99
2101: trace 0@

0AC9: free_memory 0@

2001: get_script_filename -1 full_path false store_to 0@v
2101: trace "This script file:~w~ %s" 0@v

0AC8: allocate_memory size 260 store_to address 0@
0AAA: get_script_struct_named script_name 'main' store_to address 1@
2001: get_script_filename 1@ full_path true store_to 0@
2101: trace "Ohter script:~w~ %s" 0@
0AC9: free_memory 0@

then

end

get_var_pointer 1@ {store_to} 6@

int ptr = get_this_script_struct

int baseIp = read_memory_with_offset ptr {offset} 0x10 {size} 4 // get CRunningScript::BaseIP
shortString name = read_memory_with_offset ptr {offset} 0x08 {size} 4 // get CRunningScript::Name
memory.2404:

get_script_struct_just_created 11@

// wait for script to finish
while is_script_running 11@
    wait 0
end

text.2605:
while true
   wait 0 // draw each frame
   use_text_commands {state} true
   display_text_formatted {offsetLeft} 50.0 {offsetTop} 100.0 {format} "Simple text"
   display_text_formatted {offsetLeft} 50.0 {offsetTop} 200.0 {format} "Timer: %d" {args} TIMERA
end
